325b7(mdo 'grel): gzhung (bsdu ba'i bzhi) ma nyams pa sdud ba pos bsdus pa bka' de rnams su yang (bzhugs par mi nus) ste/ (theg pa che chung gnyis) bar shin tu ring ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gal te dman pa'i theg par theg pa chen po zhugs ba'am nang du
326a1(mdo 'grel): 'dus par gyur na ni de'i theg pa chen po nyid kyang (chen po bdun med pa'i phyir) nyams par 'gyur te/ ci rgya mtsho chen po khron pa la sogs pa rnams su ma zhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ram nang du ma 'dus pa nyid kyi phyir chu'i rten ma yin par 'gyur ram/ de'i
326a2(mdo 'grel): phyir (sde yi gzhung) de rnams su mi 'jug pa ni theg pa chen po'i yon tan kho na'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir (mdo sde rgyan gyi skabs dang por) gsungs pa/ (theg pa chen po) rang gi (mdo sde) nyid la 'jug phyir dang/ (/byang sems) rang gi (nyon mongs pa rnam rtog) 'dul
326a3(mdo 'grel): la snang phyir yang/ /rgya che'i phyir dang zab pa'i phyir/ (/byang chub chen po thob pa'i) chos nyid dang ni 'gal med phyir/ /ces so/ /gal te da ni sde pa'i gzhung 'di rnams bkar mi 'dod na bsnyen par rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i las rnams ci ltar
326a4(mdo 'grel): 'grub/ (ste mi 'grub cing) dge slong nyid med na skyon mang po rnams su 'gyur ro zhe na/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dngos po de'ang (theg chen la skur pa 'debs pa khyed rnams kyis) yod pa'am med pa zhes ci ltar shes par bya ste/ mngon sum las ma yin zhing/
326a5(mdo 'grel): rjes su dpag pa las kyang ma yin te/ (de sgrub pa la tshul gsum pa'i) rtags med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang gzhung 'di rnams bka' nyid dam bka' ma yin pa nyid na'ang (cho ga'i gzhung rnams rjes su gnang ba'i bka' yin pas) bsnyen par rdzogs pa la sogs
326a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i las rnams 'grub po/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa rnam pa bcu'o zhes 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams smra ba (so so mthar byed pa gzhan gyi rnam rig byed sogs kyis shes pa'i sogs kyis bsdus pa) 'di lta ste/ rang (mdzod 'brel bzhi par) 'byung nyid kyis (bsnyen par rdzogs par)
326a7(mdo 'grel): ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o/ /skyon med pa (Am nges pa) la bzhugs pas cang shes kau di n+ya? dang rta thul dang bzang ldan dang rlangs pa dang ming chen te lnga rnams kyi'o/ /dge slong tshur shog gis grags pa la sogs pa
326b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi'o/ (/sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar la mang du byung/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la) ston par khas blangs pa las (bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni) 'od srungs chen po'i 'o/ /dris shing mnyes pas legs byin gyi'o/ /lci ba'i chos khas blangs pas skye dgu'i bdag mo
326b2(mdo 'grel): chen mo'i 'o/ /pho nyas chos sbyin ma'i 'o/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga (I dge 'dun gyi las chog byas) pas yul mdza' khob rnams su'o/ /bcu'i tshogs kyis (dge 'dun gyi) dbus rnams su'o/ /skyabs su 'gro ba (lan) gsum brjod pas bzang
326b3(mdo 'grel): sde'i tshogs drug cu rnams kyi'o zhes so/ /de ltar rjes su gnang ba'i bka' rnams klags pas kyang gsol bar (bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i chog) byed de/ don gyis (rjes su gnang ba'i bka' ) de rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa (bsnyen par rdzogs pa)
326b4(mdo 'grel): nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni don la rton pa ste/ tshig 'bru la ston pa ni ma yin no zhes so/ /rgyas pas ci zhig ste/ dka' (O rgyal) ba ('di ma thag tu 'chad pa) 'di ni brgal dka' ba ste/ gang de
326b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa pa rnams kyang chos 'dod pa la (rgyud bla ma'i rdo rje'i gnas bzhi par/ /chos la khong khro bdag lta dang/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang/ /sems can don la ltos med pa/ /'dod chen mu stegs nyan thos dang/ /rang byung rnams kyi sgrib rnam bzhi//
326b6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa 'dod chen ltar/) bsgribs pas phyin ci log pa rnams theg pa chen po spong ba'i tshul ma yin pa chen po la 'jug pa'o/ /ji skad du (rin chen phreng le'u bzhi par) gsungs pa/ theg pa chen po gang zhig tu/ (/spyod pa) thams cad snying rje'i
326b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba can/ (/drug dang) rgyu mthun ye shes dri med bshad/ (/pa'i theg chen) de la sems yong su zhig smod/ /skyon dang yon tan mi shes pa 'am/ /yon tan (la) skyon du blta ba'am/ /yon tan ldan (gzhan la phan 'dogs pa) la sdang ba zhig /theg
327a1(mdo 'grel): pa che la smod byed pa'o/ zhes so/ /yang na (theg chen la smod pa) 'di la mtshan pa ci yod de gang long ba rnams kyis nyams par (Am 'khrul pa) bya ba yin pas so/ /gang bzlog par byas pa rnams kyang mi
327a2(mdo 'grel): nyan zhing/ bdag dang gzhan rnams (rgyud bla mar gang zhig yid ni ches la sdang ba de la thar pa ga la yod ces gsungs pa ltar/) g.yang sa chen por (ngan 'gro) ltung bar byed do/ zhes rjes su brtse bar bya ba'o zhes pa shin tu 'bras pas (phan par smra ba)
327a3(mdo 'grel): chog go/ (smon lam) dgu pa la de ma thag pa gsum gyis lus la sogs pa'i (ngag dang yid) las (don yod pa) bstan no/ /rang bzhin gyis (sdug bsngal) dang/ gegs las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por go rim bzhin du
327a4(mdo 'grel): sman chen po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam pa nyid do/ /bcu pa la byis pa rnams te gdul bya rnams kyi gtso bor gdul pa'i gnas ('dzam bu gling pa yin pa) nyid kyi phyir/ byis pa'i lam gsungs pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling
327a5(mdo 'grel): ngo/ dzam+bu'i gling gcig gi (du byang chub pa ston pa'i) dus su dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa'o zhes pa'i don to/ /mthu ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rnams su gdul bya thams cad la bden pa (bzhi)
327a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i ched du'o/ /ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni (chos gang rung) gcig mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas chos la bdag (bden pa) med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das par mos pa'i phyir ro//
327a7(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dbyings ltar rgya che ba ni dag cig brjod pas gdul bya mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyi sems la cig car go bar byed pas so/ /smon lam 'di rnams sa (gnyis pa la sogs) gong ma rnams su rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mos
327b1(mdo 'grel): pa spyod pa'i sa la ni 'di lta 'di ltar gyur zhes mos pa rnams so// (mdo sde rgyan du/ chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas 'dir/ /tshul khrims kyi ni phung po spyong/ /de'i 'og tu ting 'dzin dang/ /shes phung po rnam par sbyong/ /de las gzhan pa rnams la ni/ /sgrib rnams bzhi dang thogs pa yi/ /sgrib pa las kyang rnam grol dang/
327b2(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i ye shes rnam par sbyong/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/) de bzhin dus 'di nas gzung nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ting 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnams yongs su sbyong
327b3(mdo 'grel): bar byed do/ (/phung po) 'dir dang po gsum ni (rim pa ltar) lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i bslab pa gsum mo// (mdo sde rgyan du/ mtshan med 'du byed dang bcas par/ /gnas pa 'bras bu dang po yin/ /de nyid mngon 'du byed med dang/ /zhing gi rnam par dag pa dag /'bras
327b4(mdo 'grel): bu gnyis par 'dod pa yin/ /sems can smin pa grub nyid dang/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzung dag ni/ /grub pa 'bras bu dam pa yin/ /'bras bu rnam pa 'di bzhi ni/ /sa bzhi po la yang dag bsten/ /ces gsungs pa 'bras bu bzhi'i sgrib pa las/) rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni mi slob pa'i lam mo/ (/sa bdun pa la sogs pa bzhi/
327b5(mdo 'grel): shes bya la thogs pa'i sgrib pa las) rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ni mi slob pa'i (yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas) yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/ (/shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes) de bzhin du yang 'di smon las dngos po thams
327b6(mdo 'grel): cad las bltos pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la blo rgya che ba'i spro ba yang dag par skyes pa/ (chos dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rtogs pas rang gzhan) mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa las rang gi don bzhin du gzhan gyi don rnams la 'jug bzhin pa ni
327b7(mdo 'grel): gtong ba? (sbyin pa/) chen po la rab tu 'jug ste/ (rdzas) gang (slong ba po) gang gis don du gnyer ba (slong ba'i rdzas) de (slong ba po) de la ster bar byed cing phyi rol (nor ram) lam nang (lus) yang rung gang yongs su mi gtong ba'i dngos po de med de/ de
328a1(mdo 'grel): ltar (byang chub sems dpa' ) 'di'i gtong ba (sbyin pa) chen po 'byung ngo/ /ji skad du 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa/ sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas mang po rnams (snang bar 'gyur)
328a2(mdo 'grel): te mthong ba rgya chen po nyid dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis nas/ ji srid sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams (snang bar 'gyur) gyi bar dang (byang chub sems dpa' ) de de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams mthong nas lhag pa'i
328a3(mdo 'grel): bsam pa rgya chen po nyid kyis bkur stir (bstong pa dang bsngags pas de'i yon tan smra bar) byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor (gus par smra ba dang phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa) byed/ (me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas) mchod par byed do nas ji srid byang chub sems
328a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' i (yo byad 'jig rten dang thun mong ma yin pa) bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub po dang/ (mchod pa byas pa'i) dge ba'i rtsa ba de rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /des
328a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da rnams la mchod pa las sems can yongs su smin par byed pa kun tu skyes pa yin te bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing de las 'di (phar phyin bcu'i
328a6(mdo 'grel): nang nas) sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ches shin tu lhag par 'gyur la/ pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma (dgu po) rnams la (ci nus pa'i 'os su) yang dag par mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes so/ /yum tshan mo dag tuAng gsungs pa/ bcom
328a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das ji srid du/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rgya chen po dang bdag nyid chen po'i bsam pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di (rgyal sras) rnams (phyin ci log pa ni med pa'i phrin las kyi thad du)
328b1(mdo 'grel): brgya byin nyid dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid la sogs pa'i ('khor ba dang theg pa dman) phun sum tshogs pa rnams don du mi gnyer ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba yongs su sngo
328b2(mdo 'grel): bar byed do nas ji srid (rgyal sras) du 'di rnams (nyon mongs pas) chags pa med pa dang (chos su bden par) 'dzin pa med pa nyid de/ 'di ni (rgyal sras) 'di rnams kyi rgya che ba'i bsam pa nyid do/ /gang yang de'i chags pa med pa'i bde ba dang
328b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste bde ba de thams cad kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du 'dod cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed pa/
328b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba yongs su gtong ba nyid kyis te/ 'di ni (rgyal sras) 'di rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid kyis bsam pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' i chos rnams te (chos)
328b5(mdo 'grel): de rnams thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyi 'o/ /zhes so/ (/sa 'grel du) de la mthong ba rgya che ba nyid ni gang mthu'i khyad par gyi gzugs kyi sku mthong ba'o/ /smon lam
328b6(mdo 'grel): gyi stobs kyis ni gang nang gi yang dag pa'i smon lam las (chos mthong bas) chos kyi sku mthong ba'o/ (/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po zhes) thabs mkhas pa nyid kyis mang po nyid dang rab tu gyur pa bstan pa'i don du grangs
328b7(mdo 'grel): rnam pa mang pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni bsam pa la brten pa yang ste de'ang rnam pa drug ste/ mi ngoms pa (I bsam pa) dang/ rgya che ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ phan pa dang/ gos pa med pa 
329a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ dge ba'i bsam pa rnams kyis so/ /'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig la skad cig gcig la'ang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i (dngos pos ma ngom pa) 'jig rten gyi khams rin
329a2(mdo 'grel): po che (sna bdun po) thams cad kyis bkang ba snams ster zhing/ (bdag nyid stong bas mi ngoms pas) de dang mnyam pa'i lus rnams kyang (dus kyis mi ngom pas) de dang mnyam pa'i skal bar skad cig so so la sbyin par byed la/ sems can
329a3(mdo 'grel): gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can gyi khams bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya ba ji snyed pa de la yang (rnam grangs nges sbyin par byed) do/ /gzhan (sems can gyis mi ngoms pa)
329a4(mdo 'grel): yang (mdo sde rgyan du) lam ka'i 'bras mchog ldan pa'i longs spyod shing las ji lta bar/ /dogs pa dang bral lus can bsam pa rang bzhin gnas rnams kyis/ (/rgyal ba'i sras po) gang gi nor rdzas rgya che'ang blangs
329a5(mdo 'grel): nas rang nyid longs spyod pa/ gtong dga' longs spyod can de byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan min zhes so/ /'di lta bus mi ngoms pa (chog par mi 'dzin pa) kho na ni sbyin pa'i bsam pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
329a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa brgyud pa de lta bu'i (yun ring por lta ci smos) ngo bo skad cig tsams yang nyams par mi byed cing byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rgyun gcod par mi byed de/ 'di lta bu ni sbyin pa la rgya che ba'i (Am yangs pa)
329a7(mdo 'grel): bsam pa'o/ /sems can de rnams de ltar sbyin pas rjes su 'dzin pa po (byang chub sems dpa' ) ches dga' bar 'gyur gyi/ (mdo sde rgyan du/ ji ltor blo ldan 'di na kun gtong bas/ /don gnyer skye bo dga' bas dga' ba ltar/ /de ltar slongs mo pa rnams blang bya ba/ /'dod dgu
329b1(mdo 'grel): thob pa rnams kyis dgang mi 'gyur/ /ces pa ltar/) sbyin pa des rjes su gzung bar bya bzhin pa'i sems can rnams (de lta bu'i dga' ba) ma yin no zhes pa 'di lta bu'i ngo bo ni sbyin pa la dga' ba'i bsam pa'o/ /gang sbyin pas phan btags pa'i
329b2(mdo 'grel): sems can de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' bdag la ches phan 'dogs par lta'o/ /bdag nyid ni (sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par lta ba) ma yin to/ (sems can de) rnams (bdag gi) bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
329b3(mdo 'grel): chub nye bar ston pa rgyur byas nas (phan 'dogs par blta'o) so/ /'di ni phan pa'i bsam pa'o/ /sems can rnams la/ de ltar sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas kyang (tshe 'dir) lan
329b4(mdo 'grel): nam (phyi mar) rnam par smin pa (longs spyod chen po sogs) don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni gos pa med pa'i bsam pa'o/ /gang de ltar sbyin pa'i phung po rgya che ba rab tu sbyor ba'i rnam par smin pa (yang) sems
329b5(mdo 'grel): can rnams kho na'i yin par mngon par dga' bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid la ma yin zhing/ (de'i dge ba) sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yang byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
329b6(mdo 'grel): bar byed de/ 'di'i dge ba'i bsam pa'o/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pas/ tshe'i tshang (chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma) de dang mnyam pa'i bskal par rgyun tu yo byad (chu dang tsan dan dag byug pa dang nor bu sogs)
329b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis phongs bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems yongs su gang bar sbyong lam ('gro chag nyal 'dug) rnam pa bzhi byed cing/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skad cig
330a1(mdo 'grel): ma gcig nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skad cig ma gcig gi bar du sgom par byed pas (rnam grangs nges tshul khrims nas shes rab kyi bar ji tsam gyi sangs rgyas de tsam zhig sgom yang) mi ngoms pa kho na ni (rgyal sras)
330a2(mdo 'grel): de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar bsgom pa la (mi ngoms pa'i) bsam pa'o/ /sgom pa ba rgyud pa de'ang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar (skad cig tsam yang nyams par mi byed) du
330a3(mdo 'grel): rgyun mi gcod de 'di ni rgya che ba'i bsam pa'o/ /sgom pa des (sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ) ches dga' bar 'gyur gyi/ phan gdags par bya bzhin pa'i sems can rnams ni (de ltar) ma yin pa
330a4(mdo 'grel): kho na'o zhes pa 'di ni dga' ba'i bsam pa'o/ /gang rnams la (tshul khrims nas sher phyin gyi bar sgom pas) phan btags pa'i sems can de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' (bdag la) shin tu phan 'dogs pa por
330a5(mdo 'grel): blta'i bdag nyid (sems can) ni de rnams la (phan 'dogs par blta ba) ma yin te (sems can de rnams kyi bdag gi) bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye bar ston pa rgyur byas nas (phan 'dogs) so zhes pa 'di ni phan
330a6(mdo 'grel): par byed pa'i bsam pa'o/ /de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i bar gyi bsod nams rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas kyang/ lan nam
330a7(mdo 'grel): rnam par smin pa don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes pa 'di ni gos pa med pa'i bsam pa'o/ /gang (phar phyin phyi ma lnga sgom pa) de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par smin pa sems can rnams kho na'i
330b1(mdo 'grel): yin par mngon par dga' bar byed kyi bdag nyid la ma yin zhing sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar yang byed do zhes pa 'di ni dge ba'i bsam
330b2(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ sar yang (sa bcu pa'i mdor) gsungs pa skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin brgya so sor thob cing snyoms par 'jug go /sangs rgyas brgya mthong ngo/ (/sangs rgyas) de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shes so/
330b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya g.yo bar byed cing snang bar yang byed do/ /zhing brgyar 'gro'o sems can brgya yongs su smin par byed do/ /bskal pa brgyar gnas shing/ sngon dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go /chos kyi sgo brgya rnam par
330b4(mdo 'grel): 'byed do/ (/de'i 'grel par) lus brgya ston par byed do/ /lus dang lus la'ang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor brgya dang ldan par ston par byed do zhes so/ /'dir ting nge 'dzin gyi las ni sangs rgyas mthong ba la sogs pa'o/ /g.yo
330b5(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa ni gdul bya rnams 'dun par (cing gus) byed do/ /'gro ba dang snang bar byed pa dag gis (rim ngan) song ste mthong nas (gdul bya) yongs su smin par byed do/ (/snga phyi'i mthar) 'jug pa ni sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mdza' las
330b6(mdo 'grel): sems can rnam kyi sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du byas te las kyi (rgyud dam) 'gro ba ston par byed do/ /rnam par 'byed de (byang chub sems dpa' ) rang gi blo yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du/ chos kyi rnam grangs rnams kyi don sems so//
330b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad du brgya smos pa ni nges par 'gyur pa nyid kyis so/ /thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis ni grangs nges pa med pa las grangs nges pa (byung) yang ngo/ (/grangs med pa 'byung ba) de nyid kyi phyir 'dir mos pa (sa dang por ma zad)
331a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i sa la 'ang ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa rnams ('phags pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo sngar drangs pa ltar) thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams mthong ba la sogs pa'ang (brgyad stong pa'i le'u sum cu par/) gsungs so
331a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas grangs med pa mthong ba ni tshogs kyi sar yang ste 'phags pa rtag par rab tu du ba bzhin no/ /de nyid kyi phyir (rtag tu dus phyis) rab tu dga' ba'i sa la'ang ting nge 'dzin rnam grangs med pa nyid na yang rmi lam gyi gnas skabs
331a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin dus de srid par snang ba'o zhes (brgyad stong 'grel ba'i le'u sum cu gcig par bstan pa ni) pa'i cha ni seng ge bzang po'i legs pa'i cha yin la gang yang (mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi ngo bo'i sher phyin ston pa'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams) rtogs pa'i tshul
331a4(mdo 'grel): gyis brtan par so sor snang ba nyid na de rnams kyi bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thob par bya ba sangs rgyas nyid du de'i tshe kho na 'gyur ro zhes pa (slob dpon seng ge bzang pos gsungs pa) ni 'gal ba'i phyir bsam pa de ni legs pa ma yin no//
331a5(mdo 'grel): gal te thabs la mkhas pas thams cad kyi tshe (chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs pa'i) ting nge 'dzin rnams so sor snang bar 'gyur mod de lta yang sgom pa'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba'i dri ma rnams (yod pa nyid) kyis na
331a6(mdo 'grel): cher gsal ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ shin tu ring bar khyab pa mchog tu gyur ba med pa nyid kyi phyir (rab tu dga' ba'i sa) de'i tshe kho na sangs rgyas nyid du thal ba med do/ /de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi ster byang chub sems dpa' 
331a7(mdo 'grel): de ni phal cher 'dzam+bu'i gling gi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing/ (nor dang skye bo mang po la dbang bsgyur ba) dbang phyug chen po la dbang rab tu thob la/ (rnam par dkar ba'i) chos rjes su bsrung zhing gtong ba chen po rtsom pa rnams kyis chim pa med pa'o//
331b1(mdo 'grel): las gang cung zad rtsom pa de sbyin pa'am snyan par smra ba 'am/ don spyod pa'am don mthun pa nyid kyis (rtsol) te skye ba thams cad du'o/ /de la (mdo sde rgyan du/ sbyin mtshungs de ston len 'jug dang/ /bdag nyid rjes su 'jug rnams kyis/ /snyan par smra dang don sbyor/
331b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ don mthun nyid du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes pas/) sbyin pa ni (gtso bor) phyi dang nang gi zang zing sbyin pa ste/ des gdul bya rnams chos sgrub par rung bar bskyed pa'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni
331b3(mdo 'grel): snyan par smra ba'o/ /don spyod pa ni chos (phar phyin drug) la yang dag par 'god pa'i/ /don mthun pa ni gang ('dul bya) la pha rol yang dag par bkod pa (I chos) de la rang yang rjes su 'jug pa'i zhes pa bzhi sems can bsdu ba'i thabs
331b4(mdo 'grel): rnams so/ /bsdu ba de'ang mos (mdo sde rgyan du/ phal cher don med don yod dang/ /rnam kun don yod shes par bya/ /zhes pas/) pa spyod pa'i sar phal cher don med pa'o/ /sa bdun rnams la phal cher don yod pa'o/ /brgyad pa la sogs pa'i sa rnams la rnam
331b5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad du don yod pa ste/ sems can gyi don lhun gyis grub par gdon mi za bar phun sum tshogs pa'i ('grub pa) phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ las kyi dbang gis ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa
331b6(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa rnams kyi ste/ las kyi dbang gis (skye ba ni) mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su skye ba'o/ /smon lam gyi dbang gis ni sa la bzhugs pa rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du skye ba la dbang ba nyid kyis dud
331b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro la sogs pa'i dman pa'i gnas su skye ba gang yin pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis bsam gtan rnams (kyi 'bras bu skye ba) bzlog nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba gang yin pa'o/ /dbang 'byor pa'i dbang gis ni sprul pa rnams
332a1(mdo 'grel): kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs par skye ba kun tu ston pa gang yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang ('phags pa rnam grol sdes zung du 'brel ba'i tshogs kyi skabs su) gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' i snying
332a2(mdo 'grel): rje ni/ /srid par gnas pa'i rgyu yin te/ /de ni gnas pa byed kyang blo/ /zhen pa rjes su sems ma yin/ zhes so/ /der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la chags pa med par spyod cing/ 'dod pa (I yon tan) la yongs su longs
332a3(mdo 'grel): spyod pa rnam pa mang por ston par byed kyang ('dod len) de la chags pa med do/ /'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i yo byad thams cad sogs par byed cing de la'ang zhen pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang bdag gi bar
332a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa sngon ma can nyid kyis na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ni rnam par smin pa (yang yin) sdug bsngal (yang yin) gyi rgyu kho nar 'gyur la chos thams cad sgyu (brgyad stong 'grel chen sum cu par)
332a5(mdo 'grel): ma ltar bsgoms pas ni sems can gdul brgyur byas nas nyon mongs pa la dbang ba nyid thob pas (don chen po) bsam pa'i khyad par las sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin du (chags zhen med par) 'dod pa yongs su longs spyod pa
332a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras po rnams la skyon byed pa ma yin pas so/ /de skad du 'ang/ mdo sde rgyan la sogs pa rnams su gsungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams/ /rtag tu 'khor los sgyur bar ni/ /'gyur zhing skye
332a7(mdo 'grel): ba thams cad du/ /sems can don ni rab tu byed/ (/theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i ye shes kyi thad du) thabs chen ldan pa rnams la ni/ /nyon mongs ('dod chags) byang chub yan lag 'gyur/ /'khor ba'ang zhi ba'i bdag nyid du'o/ /de phyir
332b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal sras bsam mi khyab ces so/ /yang na (byang chub sems dpa' ) 'di 'dod na khyim dang chung ma dang longs spyod thams cad dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo/ /ji ltar yang 'di
332b2(mdo 'grel): 'di (sa dang po) la 'di ltar rab tu 'byung ba de bzhin du sa gong ma rnams la 'ang ngo/ /(mdo sde rgyan du/ rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dag ni/ /yon tan tshad med rnams dang ldan/ /de phyir sdom brtson khyim pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' las khyad 'phags/ /shes te/) byang chub rgyal sras
332b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' rab tu 'byung ba yang/ thog ma kho nar/ ma dang pha dang bu dang (byang ba'i phyogs kyi le'ur) chung ma la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i skyon de snyed las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su gzung ba de'i don du zhing las dang nyo tshong
332b4(mdo 'grel): dang rgyal po'i skyes bu byed pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas (dang rnam par chags pa) yongs su dkrugs pa'i (zhes byang sa) sdug bsngal las kyang ngo// (grol bas yongs su ngal ba med do//) mdza' gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa lu gu rgyud tu spyod par
332b5(mdo 'grel): nus so/ (/yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims dag pas) byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa (sa bcu'i rtogs pa) myur bar 'gyur te/ dge ba gang dang gang kho na rtsom pa de dang (myur ba myur bar) de mthar phyin pa kho nar
332b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur (bas dge ba la rab tu brtson) ro/ /brtul zhugs nges pa la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad du tshig (btsun zhing gzhan gyis) gzung bar 'os par (yid ches pa'i gnas su) 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni (chos lnga dang ldan pa)
332b7(mdo 'grel): de lta ma yin no/ /zhes pa de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyis khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag gi khyad par ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' i sar gsungs so/ /de lta bu ni (rab tu dga' ba'i) sems bskyed pa'i 'di'i yon tan rnams so/ /sngar?
333a1(mdo 'grel): gyi sems bskyed pa'i (sa gzhi) yon tan spyan dang mngon par shes pa (dang gzungs) la sogs pa rnams ni 'di la (sdang las) cher 'bar ba dang ring du khyab pa'o/ /de'i gong gi sems bskyed pa'i yon tan rnams
333a2(mdo 'grel): ni ('di tsam zhes pa'i) 'tsham pa med pa rnams so/ /ji skad du 'phags pas bcu par (sa dang po'i 'jug tu) gsungs pa/ de yan chad du byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par can gyis rnam par 'phrul te/
333a3(mdo 'grel): gang rnams kyi lus (byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa kun gyi gnas) sam 'od dam rdzu 'phrul lam spyan nam spyod yul lam dbyangs saM? spyod pa'am ('gro ba) bkod pa'am byin gyis brlabs sam mos pa'am mngon par 'du byed pa
333a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong ('bum) rnams ji snyed pa de snyed duAng bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no zhes so/ /de bzhin du sa so so la chos kyi sprin gyi bar la gsungs so/ (/sa 'grel du) de la spyan ni rnam pa lnga'o/
333a5(mdo 'grel): dbyangs ni sprul pa'i gsung ngo/ /bkod pa ni sprul pa'o/ /byin gyis brlabs ni gang gis pha rol byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la brten nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthu'i (mngon par shes pa) bya ba'i don sgrub
333a6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ shes rab kyi spyan gyis bsdus pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la brten nas chos ston pa mngon par 'du byed pa rnams so/ (/yon tan mtsham pa med pa) de lta na'ang (sa gnyis pa la sogs par) de'i yon tan rnams bag tsam brjod par bya'o/ /de
333a7(mdo 'grel): la sems bskyed pa drug pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni (ri zhes dag ldan na) ra ha na la (zhes so) sogs pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta bu ste/ yon tan rin po che thams cad (sems bskyed) de las 'byung
333b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir ro/ /dri ma med pa'i sa yang (ltung ba'i 'khrul pa'i cha phra mo rnams la yang shes bzhin du gnas par nus pa nas sa gsum pa thob pa'i bar du ste/ der mchog gi/ zhes par chos dbyings rtogs shing/ ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul pa'i dang/ /las kyi 'gro ba sna tshogs la shin tu rmongs pa dang de'i gnas
333b2(mdo 'grel): ngan len spong ngo//) ste/ gang gi phyir 'di la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma dang bral ba (ltung ba'i 'khrul pa phra mo la yang shes bzhin du 'jug pas) de'i phyir ('dod chags la sogs sna tshogs pa'i dri mas rtag tu dri ma can/ dri ma med pas gang dag pa/ /dri ma med ces brjod pa
333b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ zhes pas/) dri ma med pa'o/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'di'i lhag cing shin tu dag par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa lnga pas brtsen pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i (dge ba bcu shas che zhing dag pa) de bzhin ma yin no//
333b4(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams las tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches shes dang (slab pa las lhag pa'i tshul khrims) tshe bar 'gyur ro/ /sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phal cher gling bzhi la dbang pa'i 'khor los sgyur
333b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stobs can du 'gyur ro/ (/de yang) sems can rnams kyi tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma bzlog pa'i ched dang/ dge ba la brten pa rnams dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la dgod
333b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i ched du'o/ /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams kyang (sa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ) 'di la snang bar 'gyur te/ rgya chen po mthong bas (Am mthong brgya che ba) dang/ smon lam gyi stobs kyis so/ /thabs la mkhas
333b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs kyis na so sor snang ba 'di'ang nges pa med pa ste/ gnas skabs snga ma (sa dang po la sogs pa) rnams la bzhin no/ /nges pa las ni skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin stong thob po/ /sangs rgyas stong mthong ngo/ (/sangs rgyas) de
334a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams stong g.yo bar byed do/ (/'jig rten gyi khams so/) snang bar yang byed do/ /zhing stong duAng 'gro'o/ /sems can stong yongs su smin par byed do/ /bskal pa stong
334a2(mdo 'grel): du gnas shing/ sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug go /chos kyi sgo stong rnam par 'byed do/ /lus stong ston par byed do/ /lus re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor stong ston par byed do/ /snang ba la sogs pa rnams kyi
334a3(mdo 'grel): grangs ma nges pa dang (rang rang gi skabs su bshad pa'i) nges pa 'di dag kyang sems bskyed pa gong ma gong ma rnams la yang ('dir bshad pa ltar) rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du spyan dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa sems bskyed
334a4(mdo 'grel): pa snga ma'i yon tan rnams (sa gnyis pa) 'di dang phyi mar yang thams cad du/ rjes su 'jug cing (gong nas gong du) rab tu gyur pa shin tu dang ches (gsal ba la) sogs pa tha dad pa yang ngo/ /sems bskyed pa bdun pa
334a5(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste/ mi 'dod pa thog tu bab pa thams cad kyis mi 'khrug pa'i phyir ro// (chos dbyings bstod par/ nyon mongs dra ba rab 'gags nas/ /dri med shes rab rab gsal bas/ /tshad
334a6(mdo 'grel): med pa yi mun pa dag /sel bar byed pas 'od byed pa) zhes pa las 'ong byed pa yang ste/ ('jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin mdza' dag la snyoms par 'jug nus pa dang/ ji snyed bos pa'i don du 'dzin nus pa nas gzung nas sa bzhi pa ma thob pa'i bar du ste/ der chos dbyings rgyu mthun don gyi mchog
334a7(mdo 'grel): nyid shes par rtogs shing/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu rmongs pa dang/ thos pa'i gzugs ma rdzogs pa'i shin tu rmongs pa dang/ de'i gnas ngan len spong ngo/) /gang gi phyir 'di la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten pa ('di ltar thob pa'i) chos kyi snang ba chen po byed pas so/
334b1(mdo 'grel): 'dir byang chub sems dpa' shin tu so sor rtogs pa'i shes pa can te phyir yang tshad med pa dam pa'i chos (kyi tshig dang don) tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas shing/ nyin dang mtshan du chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba dang/
334b2(mdo 'grel): chos smra ba la dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro/ /phyi 'am nang gi dngos po gang (chos smre ba) de la mi sbyin pa de cung zad kyang med pa dang/ bla ma la (lus kyi) bsnyen bkur bya ba gang nyams su mi len pa de cung sa rtag tu sbyor ba
334b3(mdo 'grel): zad kyang med pa dang/ (chos nyan pa'i ched du) lus kyi gnod pa gang mi len pa de cung zad kyang med do/ /rtag par rab tu (chos la) sbyor ba'i rgyu ni chos la gus pa mchog tu gyur pa'o/ (/byang sems) de ni nor dang rgyal srid
334b4(mdo 'grel): dang bde 'gror skye ba dang 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa (bsam gtan dang gzugs med kyi sems) dang bdag nyid kyi lus pas kyang chos shin tu gces par byed de/ (rgyal sras sa gsum pa) de ni chos kyis shin tu dga' 
334b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur gyi/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa nyid (kyis dga' ba) ma yin la chos kyi tshig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa
334b6(mdo 'grel): yongs su spong ba gcig gi don duAng stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes (kun tu 'bar ba rab tu mched pa me lce gcig tu gyur pa) gang par yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar nas kyang bdag nyid 'dod
334b7(mdo 'grel): bar spro na mi'i 'bos? tha mal bar lta ci smos te 'on kyang bdag gis dmyal ba dang ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun tu gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal bar bya na mi'i sdug bsngal la kun tu
335a1(mdo 'grel): gnas pas (chos btsal bar bya ba) lta ci smos shes brtson 'grus drag po rtsom pas (chos tshol zhing) ji skad thos la'i chos rnams la (phyin ci ma log par) tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can du
335a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te chos de rnams thos na gcig tu dpen bar song bas 'di ltar dpyod de/ chos (mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa) dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos (rgyal sras kyi lam) bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di rnams
335a3(mdo 'grel): khong du chud par bya'i/ dag gi las yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin no zhes 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs so/ (/chos dang rjes su mthun pa zhes pa) 'dir chos ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i chos so/ /de
335a4(mdo 'grel): dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos ni rjes su ba'i chos te/ chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i stobs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rig nas (lhag pa'i sems kyi slab pa shas che ba bsam gtan) dang gzugs med pa'i
335a5(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang tshad med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams sbyor ba las thob kyi/ mngon par dga' (zhing ste) ba la gnas nyid kyis ni ma yin te/ de kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/
335a6(mdo 'grel): de la bsam gtan rnams (la) ni (bde min la) bde bar mngon par nga rgyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi dbang du byas (nas snyoms par 'jug) pa'o/ /gzugs med pa rnams ni (thar pa min pa la) thar par mngon par nga rgyal
335a7(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyi'o// (dbang du byas nas snyoms par 'jug pa) byams pa dang snying rje dag sdug bsngal can rnams kyi'o/ (/bdag gi sdug bsngal las dgrol lo snyam pas) dga' ba dang btang snyoms dag grol ba rnams kyi'o/ (/dbang du byas nas sgom pa'o//)
335b1(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa rnams ni skyabs ngan pa (dbang phyug la sogs pa) la zhugs pa rnams kyi dbang du byas nas te/ mthu khyad par can gyis (mdo sde rgyan gyi mthun skabs su/ phyogs su/ des nga sangs rgyas sems can dag/ yang dag mchod byed rnam par
335b2(mdo 'grel): dag pa bskyed ces gsungs/) gzhug pa'i don du'o/ /ma nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa (mngon shes kyi bar) thob pa'i phyir sa 'di ni (bsam gtan sogs) de rnams kyi rab tu phye ba yin no/ /sa snga ma (gnyis) dag na yang de
335b3(mdo 'grel): rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ni ma yin no/ /'dir mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te de skad duAng (sa gsum pa'i) mdor/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa dus so sor nyams su myong bar byed des yang g.yo bar byed do//
335b4(mdo 'grel): (lus la dbang bas) gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro/ /mang por gyur (sgros) nas gcig tu (bsdus par) 'gyur ro/ /snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar gyur pa'ang nyams su myong bar byed do/ (byed pa la dbang bas) rtsig pa las thad ka dang
335b5(mdo 'grel): ra ba (gang gi khang pa bskong ba) la'ang thad ka dang/ ri la'ang thad kar mi thogs par 'gro'o/ /nam mkha' la'ang (skyil krung gi bya bzhin) 'gro ba dang/ sa la'ang (tshul bzhin) steng du 'byung ba dang/ byi'u zul byed do/ /chu la (mi phyir bar) sa la bzhin du
335b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro'o/ /du ba thul bar yang byed/ 'bar bar yang byed do/ /sprin chen po bzhin du lus las chu 'byin te/ chu gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams kun tu 'bar ba'ang zhi bar byed (pa'i chu rgyun 'byin) pa'o/ /
335b7(mdo 'grel): nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang lag pas (reg cing) yongs su nyug (cing 'jug) par byed do/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar duAng (snod kyi 'jig rten la dbang bsgyur bas) lus kyis dbang sgyur (te lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed)
336a1(mdo 'grel): ro/ so sor snang ba dang/ bde ba'ang ster ro/ /'od zer yang rab tu 'gyed do/ /de lha'i rna ba'i khams mi'i las 'das pas lha dang mi rnams kyis sgra rnams (mnar med kyi bar)
336a2(mdo 'grel): zhes dza ya) thos so/ /dmyal ba dang byol song dang yi dags rnams kyi dang/ (chung nguAng thos te) tha na sha sgra dang sbrang bcu mchu ring dang/ srin bu dang bya dang bung ba rnams kyi yang sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams kyi nyen pa'i
336a3(mdo 'grel): sgra thos nas (de rnams kyis) sdug bsngal de bsal ba'i ched du 'bar cing/ ('jig rten gyi khams) 'di nyid du gnas nas zhing sna tshogs pa rnams na sangs rgyas rnams chos ston pa nyan no/ /des (la la la) sems (nyam thag pa)
336a4(mdo 'grel): can (la la la) pha rol dang gang zag pha rol rnams kyi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag par ji lta bar rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'o zhes pa dang/ de bzhin du 'dod chags
336a5(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba dang/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang/ zhe sdang dang bral ba dang/ gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i sems nas i srid bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems so (rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs)
336a6(mdo 'grel): zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran pa dang gnyis dang gsum nas ji srid skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar yang rjes su dran no/ /nyi ma gcig dang gnyis dang gsum
336a7(mdo 'grel): rnams nas ji srid du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar rnams kyang rjes su dran no/ (/gnas) che ge mo zhig tu bdag ming 'di zhes ba bar gyur/ rus dras srong rgyas (pa'i rgyud la sogs pa) 'di lta bu/ (bram ze la sogs pa) rigs
336b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu/ khas zas 'di lta bu/ yun 'di lta bur gnas tshe'i mdza' ni 'di lta bu thub bdag (skyes gnas) de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes pa na ji srid de nas (mthar) shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes pa nas/ ji srid yan lag dar
336b2(mdo 'grel): bcas rnam pa (gnas lugs) dang bcas ched du bya ba (Am dan rtags) dang bcas rgyu mtshan (rgyu gang gis der skyes pa) dang bcas pa'i sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ /pha rol po rnams kyi yang sngon gyi srid pa (pha rol po) de rnams (rab tu bye ba)
336b3(mdo 'grel): kho nas dran du 'jug go (/byang sems) des lha'i mig (yongs su gsal bar mthong bas) rnam par dag pa (yul kun na gnas pa'i gzugs mthong bar nus pas) mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams mthong ste/ 'tshe bzhin pa dang skye bzhin pa dang/ skyes
336b4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang dman pa dang (bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro gnyis ka'i) gya nom pa rnams dang/ bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro las ji lta bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di rnams (zin)
336b5(mdo 'grel): lus kyi legs par spyod pa (gsum) dang dag gi legs par spyod pa (bzhi) dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa (gsum) dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba can rnams te/ legs par spyod pa'i rgyu
336b6(mdo 'grel): des/ lus zhig nas pa de 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du (mi dang) lha rnams su skye'o/ /sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa (mi dge ba bcu) dang dag gi nyes par spyad pa dang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa 'phags
336b7(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par (las dang 'bras bu mi bden pa) lta ba can rnams te log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu las/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu (sdug bsngal gyi gnas su mngon par grub pas ngan pa bar song sems par spyad pas 'gro ba ngan par?)
337a1(mdo 'grel): 'gro (gnod pa sna tshogs su lhung ba'i don gyis) log par ltung ba dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/ /zhes lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' i
337a2(mdo 'grel): khams kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so zhes so/ /'dir mngon par shes pa gcig (rdzu 'phrul) gis sems can rnams nye bar gnon (pa'am bgrod) no
337a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pas khyab bdag nyid thob po/ (/gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang lha'i rna ba) gnyis kyis chos ston pa sgra dang don so so yang dag par rig pa las te/ sems shes nas skad gzhan rnams kyis don shes par byed pas so/ (/sngon gnas dran pa
337a4(mdo 'grel): dang lha'i mig) gnyis dag gis 'ong ba dang 'gro ba shes te/ sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mdza' i yongs su smin pa shes so/ /rnam par dag pa ni gsal bar thob pa'i phyir ro/ /mi'i las 'das pa ni thag ring po nas
337a5(mdo 'grel): thos pa ste mi'i sgra las shin tu 'das nas 'og tu ji srid mnar med pa'i bar gyi sgra thos par nus pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa ni 'di rnams thams cad tha dad pa'o/ /ched du bya ba (Am ngan rtags) ni ming ngo/ /rgyu mtshan ni rigs
337a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rnams te/ gang gis skyes pa'i rgyu mtshan no/ (/byang sems sa gsum pa) 'di la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba rgya chen po nyid dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis so/
337a7(mdo 'grel): de'ang phal cher sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po lha'i rgyal po dbang por (brgya byin) 'gyur la sems can gyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bzlog pa'i thabs yang dag par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ sems can rnams 'dod
337b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'dam las gdon pa'i don du'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnams las (thob pa'i dka' spyod sag? nus pas) bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las don spyod pa'o/ /skad cig
337b2(mdo 'grel): gcig gis ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong (la snyoms par 'jug pa) thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'bum mthong ba dang/ de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes (de sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bzhin du rnam par mi rtogs pa'i ye shes nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro zhes dza ya/)
337b3(mdo 'grel): so/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya g.yo zhing snang bar byed pa dang/ zhing brgya phrag stong du 'gro ba dang/ sems can 'bum yongs su smin par byed pa (dge ba'i las la 'god pa) dang/ bskal ba stong phrag brgyar gnas (pa'i
337b4(mdo 'grel): nus pa yod) pa dang/ bskal pa 'bum byi) sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mdza' las 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi sgo 'bum rnam par 'byed pa dang/ (khong du chud nas rang gis blo gros 'phel ba'i ched du de rnams kyi don sems) lus 'bum ston pa dang/ lus sa
337b5(mdo 'grel): so la'ang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor 'bum ston par byed do/ /de ltar thob pa'i yon tan (nye bar) 'phel ba la spro ba dang ldan pa ni (brtson 'grus can sngar) rtog (zin) pa dang (sar) ma rtogs pa (rim bzhin) 'phel ba dang rtogs
337b6(mdo 'grel): pa (yang dag par) 'byung ba'i phyir yon tan thams cad kyi rgyu brtson 'grus kho na'o zhes sems bskyed pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par byed do/ (/sems bskyed pa brgyad pa) de'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa rdo rje lta
337b7(mdo 'grel): bu ste/ yid ches ba bstan pa nyid kyis nas mi phyed pa'i phyir ro/ /sa (chos dbyings bstod par/ rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyis gsal/ 'du 'dzi rnam par spangs pa yi/ ye shes 'od kyi rab bskor bas/ /sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod/ /ces pas/) 'od 'phro ba yang (ji ltar thos
338a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyis lan mang du gnas par byed nus shing chos dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems btang snyoms su byed nus pa nas gzung nas sa lnga pa thob pa'i bar du ste/ yongs su 'dzin pa med don dang/ /zhes par chos dbyings rtogs shing snyoms par 'jug pa la sred pa'i dang chos
338a2(mdo 'grel): la srid pa'i shin tu rmongs pa'i dang de'i gnas ngan len yongs su spong bas so/) /ste gang gi phyir (sa) 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs (shes pa'i shes rab shas che bas te) rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bud shing bsregs la/ de'i rgyu
338a3(mdo 'grel): las ye shes kyi me'i 'od 'byung ba'i phyir 'od 'phro ba'o/ (/'am me lce can sa bzhi pa) 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur la skad cig gcig
338a4(mdo 'grel): gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya so so thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya mthong ba dang/ de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya g.yo bar byed cing snang bar yang byed pa dang/ zhing bya ba brgyar 'gro
338a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang sems can bye ba brgya yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar gnas shing sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'jug pa dang chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya rnam par 'byed pa dang/ lus bye ba brgya ston pa dang/
338a6(mdo 'grel): lus dang lus la'ang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'i 'khor dang ldan par ston par byed do/ /phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral du 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang dag par
338a7(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa la (byed pa'i sgo nas) mkhas pa dang (mthu'i sgo nas) gtso bo ste/ sems can rnams ('jig rten pa dang de las 'das pa'i) yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod pa'i ched du mkhas pa'o/ (/sa bzhi pa) de'i bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams
338b1(mdo 'grel): las don mthun pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams las (ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa las 'das pa'i ched du rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis gnas pa'i phyir na/) brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu shas che bar 'gyur ro/ /de
338b2(mdo 'grel): nas sems bskyed pa dgu pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i ri bo lta bu ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam par g.yeng bas mi bskyod pa'i (mi g.yo ba) phyir ro/ /sa spyad dka' ba'ang ste/ (bden pa bzhi sgom ba 'khor ba la mi phyogs pa dang
338b3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa'i sems bzlog ste thabs kyis zin pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs sgom nus pa nas bzung nas sa drug pa thob kyi bar du ste/ der chos dbyings rgyud rnams tha dad med don dang/ zhes par rtogs shing 'khor ba la phyir phyogs pa dang mngon du phyogs pa dang mngon du phyogs pa yid la
338b4(mdo 'grel): byed pa 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa phyir phyogs pa dang mngon du phyogs pa yid la byed pa'i shin tu rmongs pa dang/ de dag gi gnas ngan len spong ngo/) gang gi phyir 'di la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag gi rig pa dang bden pa shes pa dag phan tshun 'gal ba las yongs su sbyong ba bya ba dka' ba de'i
338b5(mdo 'grel): phyir (chos dbyings bstong bar/ rigs dang rgyu brtsal bzo gnas kun/ /bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /nyon mongs shin tu spyad dka' las/ /rnam par rgyal bas spyad dka' o/ /zhes so/) /shin tu sbyad dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi (rin chen phreng bar lnga pa shin tu spyad)
338b6(mdo 'grel): dka' bdud/ kun gyi shin tu thub dka' i phyir/ ces gsungs/) khams thams cad na gnas pa'i bdud rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' (sa lnga pa) 'dir thub par (Am gzhom pa) mi nus so zhes pas shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba yang ngo//
338b7(mdo 'grel): de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po (gcig tu gyur nas mang por gyur pa sogs) mngon par sgrub pa'i sna tshogs pa'i thabs dang bya ba rab tu sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /de
339a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal sras) de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par sbyor (zhing brtson) pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi (yongs su smin pa'i khyad par byed 'dod pas na de'i) rjes su song ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la
339a2(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba la (zhugs pa'i) phyir mi ldog pa ste khyad par can gyi chos (kyi lam) tshol ba la (de 'dod pas) mngon par brtson pas/ sems can la phan pa gang 'jig rten na rab tu sbyong ba/ (don dang bya ba rjed pa'i gnod pa'i gnyen por) yi ge dang (lta ba ngan pa dang
339a3(mdo 'grel): blo chud pas gnod pa sel ba'i) bstan bcos dang rgya dang (nor blangs pa ma spas pa'i gnyen por) grangs dang rtsis ('du ba dang dgod pas rmongs pa'i gnyen por) dang shod thabs la sogs pa rnams dang/ (dbul ba'i gnyen por) khams kyi rgyud (dam nor sgyur ba'i dpyad)
339a4(mdo 'grel): dang gso ba'i rgyud dbul ba dang brjed byed dang 'byung bo'i gdon sel ba rnams dang/ dug dang ro langs kyi sbyor ba 'joms par byed pa rnams dang/ snyan rang gas (zlos gang la sogs pa) dang gar thabs dang gtam rgyud dang/ rol mo
339a5(mdo 'grel): dang (yid mi bde ba'i gnod pa'i gnyen por) sngon byung ba rab tu dga' bar byed pa rnams dang/ (gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba'i gnod pa'i gnyen por) grong dang grong khyer dang skyes mos tshal dang 'bab chu chu klung dang mtsho dang 'tshe'u dang rdzing bu dang
339a6(mdo 'grel): me tog dang 'bras bu dang sman dang nags tshal mngon par sgrub pa rnams dang/ (bsad pa dang 'chid ba chad pa la sogs pa'i gnyen por) gser dang dngul dang nor bu dang mu tig dang baiDUrya dang dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang rin po che'i byung/ bur
339a7(mdo 'grel): bstan pa rnams dang/ (mi mthong ba dang rnam smin thob pa'i yan lag gi nyes pa las gyur ba'i gnyen por) zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang 'ong dang sa g.yo ba dang gcan zan (gza''dzin gyi la bya'i la nye dang) de dang rmi lam phyi ltas ston pa la 'jug
339b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sems can gyi yan lag dang nyid lag gi mtshan nyid spyod pa (lag ris lta bu) dang rjes su spyod pa'i sbyor ba'i ltas rnams dang/ sdom ('chal ba'i tshul khrims nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po) pa'i cho ga dang/ ('dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen bar)
339b2(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang/ (skyabs ngan pa'i gnyer por) mngon par shes pa dang/ (log pa'i bsod nams la sbyor ba'i gnyen por) tshad med pa dang/ gzugs (log pa'i thang pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur) med pa'i gnas rnams dang/ gzhan yang gang (sems can la)
339b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par tho 'tsham pa med pa dang/ rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang ldan pa rnams dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba (I 'jig rten pa'i shes pa) de rnams kyang snying rje dang ldan pas mthar gyis sangs rgyas
339b4(mdo 'grel): kyi chos la 'god pa'i ched du mngon par sgrub po zhes 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs so/ (/sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i rgyal spos) 'di la'ang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gis ting nge 'dzin
339b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba stong thob po/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong mthong ngo/ (/sangs rgyas) de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong g.yo bar byed snang bar byed do/ /zhing bye ba stong duAng 'gro'o/ /sems can bye ba stong yongs su smin
339b6(mdo 'grel): par byed do/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du gnas shing sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mdza' 'jug go /chos kyi sgro bye ba stong rnam par 'byed do/ /lus bye ba stong ston par byed do/ /lus dang lus la'ang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor bye ba stong
339b7(mdo 'grel): ston par byed do/ /phal cher lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan du 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad mu stegs pa'i gnas thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa la byang (mkhas pa) pa dang gtso bo yin zhing sems can rnams
340a1(mdo 'grel): bsdu ba'i dngos po (gzhi) rnams kyis bden pa (bzhi rtogs pa) la 'god pa la mkhas pa yin no/ (/don dam par dben pa'i rnam pa sgom pa lan mang du byed pa'i) bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la shin tu shas
340a2(mdo 'grel): che bar 'gyur ro/ (/skyo ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis mtshan ma med pa la mnyam par 'jog nus pa nas sa bdun pa thob kyi bar du ste/ der chos dbyings nyon mongs dag min don dang/ zhes rtogs shing 'du byed 'byung ba mngon sum du gyur pa'i dang mtshan ma mang du 'byung ba'i shin tu rmongs pa dang
340a3(mdo 'grel): de'i ga nas ngan len spong ngo/) /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa thob pa de las (byang chub sems dpa' ) 'di'i sems bskyed pa bcu pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa sman chen po lta bu ste/ nyon mongs
340a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /sa mngon du gyur pa'ang ste/ gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba (bcu gnyis shes pa'i shes rab shas che bas de) rnam par 'byed pa
340a5(mdo 'grel): las chags pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa mngon du 'gyur te de'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'o/ (/zhes so) 'di la'ang byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
340a6(mdo 'grel): stong mang po rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin bye ba 'bum so sor thob po/ /sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum mthong ngo/ /de rnams kyi byin rlabs kyang shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya

340b1(mdo 'grel): 'jug go /chos kyi sgo bye ba 'bum rnam par 'byed par byed do/ /lus bye ba 'bum ston par byed do/ /lus dang lus la'ang byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor byed pa 'bum ston par byed do/ /phal cher lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dgar

340b3(mdo 'grel): du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas rtogs pas) 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches shas che bar yang 'gyur ro/ (/dbu ma la 'jug par) de ltar blo (shes rab) yi (de kho na nyid mthong ba la gegs byed pa'i mun pa 'joms pas) 'od zer
340b4(mdo 'grel): gsal por snang ba can/ /rang gi lag mthil son pa'i skyu ru ra (shin tu gsal bar rtogs pa) ji bzhin/ (/snying rjes 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa'i don du sbyor ba la) srid gsum 'di ni gdod nas ma skyes par/ /rtogs te tha snyad (kun rjod kyi)
340b5(mdo 'grel): bden pa'i stobs las (stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pas) 'gog pa rtogs/ (/de'i 'grel par) 'gog pa thob pas 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i bsam pa yongs su gtong ba'ang ma yin te/ (/thugs rjes yongs su mi 'dor bas so/)
340b6(mdo 'grel): 'khor bar son pa'i (Am rtogs pa) sbyor ba (snying rjes 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa'i don du sbyor ba) dang mya ngan las 'das par son pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa (shes rab kyi sgo nas stong nyid) sgom pa ni (byang chub sems dpar) 'di yi 'gro ba dgon
340b7(mdo 'grel): med pa la snying rje shin tu ches 'phel bar byed pas so/ /de nas sems bskyed pa bcu gcig pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas bshes gnyen (ni mdza' bo) lta bu ste byams pa (sems can rnams la bde bsgrub)
341a1(mdo 'grel): */ (/X ba'i bsam pa ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa) dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms (ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa zhes dag ldan) gyi mtshan nyid can mi zad pa'i tshad med pa (sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa)
341a2(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa nyid kyis gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du bcom ldan 'das ma bar mar gsungs pa/ dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang rnam
341a3(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas (rgya mtsho chen por chu'i thig pa gcig por ba'i dpes) mi zad par byed 'dod pa dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du dmyal ba dang byol song (thabs mkhas pas)
341a4(mdo 'grel): gi skye gnas dang (rje bo) gshin rje'i ('khor gyi) 'jig rten gyi (yi dags kyi) sdug bsngal rnams la (bzod pas) spro bar 'dod pa dang/ bskal pa stong phrag brgyar bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyang sems
341a5(mdo 'grel): can la bltos nas (te sems can la rjes su brtse bas) gtong bar 'dod pa (bram ze'i khye'u skar ma lta bu) dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs (sa brgyad par) su skye bar 'dod pa dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang/ skyes bu chen
341a6(mdo 'grel): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par byed 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ zhes so// (mdo'i dag) 'dir sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba ni khyad
341a7(mdo 'grel): par du 'phags shing lhun gyis grub pa mtshan ma med par gnas pa sa mi g.yo ba thob pa'o/ /sems bskyed pa 'di yang sa ring du song ba (bar skabs med par mtshan ma med pa sgom nus pa nas bzung nas sa brgyad pa thob kyi
341b1(mdo 'grel): bar du ste/ chos kyi dbyings/ tha dad med pa'i don nyid dang/ /zhes par rtogs shing mtshan ma phra mo 'byung ba'i dang/ rab tu mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa'i thabs la shin tu rmongs pa dang/ de'i gnas ngan len spong ngo/) /ste/ gang gi phyir 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs dang bden
341b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs pa mtshan ma med pa'i gnas pa 'bad pas 'jug pa ste/ de'i phyir (chos dbyings bstod par/ 'khor lo'i bkod pa rnam kun tu/ /'od kyi dra bas brtse ba dang/ /'khor ba'i mtsho yi 'dam brgal bas/ /de la
341b3(mdo 'grel): ring du song zhes bya/ /zhes so//) ring du song ba'o/ /'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan pa'i don du bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/
341b4(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa drug rnams la 'ang ngo/ /de la rdzu? 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam pa gnyis te/ (byang chub sems dpa' i mthu'i le'ur) yongs su bsgyur ba pa dang/ sprul pa pa'o/ /dang po ni g.yo bar byed pa la sogs
341b5(mdo 'grel): pa sngar (sa gsum skabs su) ji skad bshad pa'o/ /sprul pa po ni rnam pa gsum ste/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sprul pa las so/ /de ltar ni phyogs bcur grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su
341b6(mdo 'grel): grags med pa'i sems can gyi don du skad cig gcig la'ang 'gro ba drug gi sems can gyi gzugs kha dog sna tshogs pa (I sku) sprul pa rnams kyis phun sum tshogs par byed do// (gsung gi

342a1(mdo 'grel): dbyangs de las kyang rnam pa du mar chos ston par byed do/ /yang na gzhan sprul pa rnams kyis (chos ston pa 'am bag med bskul ba) byed du 'jug/ /

342a3(mdo 'grel): rin po che la sogs pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi don du (ji ltar 'dod pa ltar) sprul par byed do/ /zag pa zad pa shes pas (I mngon shes kyi) bdag (de bzhin gshegs pa

342a5(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ gang phyogs bcu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams dang gang yang de rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa (bzhugs pa) de rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa (ste de
